title: [COMPLETE] OCE Platform Maintenance - 2017-05-10 @ 1:00am AEST
body:
Hi Folks

We'll be doing some planned maintenance on the OCE servers in the early morning of Wednesday 10th May.

What you need to know:

* Ranked Queues will be disabled on **TUESDAY 9th May at 11:30pm** AEST (Sydney Time).  
* The OCE servers will be shut down on **WEDNESDAY 10th May at 1:00am** AEST for a 5 hour maintenance window
* We're planning to open back up at approximately 0600 AEST.
* Keep an eye on the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) page in case there are any updates or changes to the plan.

Let me know here if you have any questions.

Cheers!
Mindstar

replies.body: So I'm guessing this will solve the reconnection issue a lot of people have been having this patch?

Hi Percival - what issue are you referring to?  Can you give a bit more of a description?

Mindstar

Being randomly disconnected from a game (even with a good internet connection), and unable to reconnect because no reconnect button appears. The match also disappears from match history and there is no LP loss or leaverbuster. 

Even closing and reopening the client doesn't fix this. 

I've experienced this, and there are many posts on the boards about it from others. 

I've even sent tickets to Riot Support who say they're aware of the problem and are working on it.

Thanks for the info.  When was the last time this happened to you?   There was a bug that was causing this type of behaviour, but I believe it was fixed over the last couple of days.

Cheers

Mindstar
